meanings.definition: A small protein-like molecule used by neurons to communicate with each other.
meanings.sent1: The neuropeptide helped the neurons send messages to each other.
meanings.sent2: Scientists are studying how neuropeptides affect brain function.
meanings.sent3: The playful neuron used a neuropeptide to tell a joke to its neighbor.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness was like a neuropeptide, spreading positivity throughout the community.
meanings.sent5: The glowing neuropeptide lit up the neural pathways, creating a beautiful display.

meanings.definition: A type of neurotransmitter found in the nervous system.
meanings.sent1: The neuropeptide released by the nerve cells helped transmit signals.
meanings.sent2: Neuropeptides play a crucial role in regulating pain perception.
meanings.sent3: The nervous system threw a party, and the neuropeptide was the life of the party.
meanings.sent4: His words acted like a neuropeptide, influencing the thoughts of those around him.
meanings.sent5: The powerful neuropeptide surged through the nerves, carrying important information.
